Hi there, so I am looking at starting a fresh ksp with military vehicles in mind. Including Aircraft, ground vehicles, naval ships, and military space craft.

The problem is that besides BDarmoury, I don't know many mods out there that cater to this kind of play, was hoping my fellow KSP'ers could help me out.

I am looking for weapon mods, naval mods, aircraft part mods like B9. Anything you think would fit in!

ps. I hope this is the right place to post this!
Interesting but do fail to see the point as there is no opponent to fight against ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

It is not so much having an opponent to fight against, but the narrative you make for yourself in a single player game. Simply put, I like designing things just as much, or even more then i like piloting them.

Still hoping someone sees this a replies ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
This gives you things to fight: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116245](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116245)

I'm not entirely sure what you're asking for here, OP.

 - If you want opponents to fight against, you can either try out the 5dim Military Contract Pack rhoak suggested, or install the DarkMultiPlayer add-on and play alongside/against other KSP users.

- If you're looking for more weapons, then your options are limited to BD Armory and InfiniteDice's Skillful Weapons and Damage add-ons. BD Armory is more popular because it has a wider variety of weapons, more features and is easier to use than Skillful.

- If you're looking for more parts to build specific military vehicles, here are some recommendations:

**Mk2 Lightnin Cockpit for B9 Aerospace (BahamutoD) -** [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96766-Mk2-Lightning-Cockpit-for-B9-Aerospace-v1-3-%28FAR-drag-fixed%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96766-Mk2-Lightning-Cockpit-for-B9-Aerospace-v1-3-%28FAR-drag-fixed%29)

**Retro Future (nli2work) aircraft / spaceplane parts -** [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84054-v0-90-v-25-Transparent-Pods-v1-2-2-for-KSP-v0-90](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84054-v0-90-v-25-Transparent-Pods-v1-2-2-for-KSP-v0-90)

**Kerbal Foundaries wheels, tracks, anti-grav repulsors (lo-fi)** - [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84102-PARTS-PLUGIN-1-0-V1-8G-Kerbal-Foundries-wheels-anti-grav-repulsors-and-tracks](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84102-PARTS-PLUGIN-1-0-V1-8G-Kerbal-Foundries-wheels-anti-grav-repulsors-and-tracks)

**Boat Parts (InfiniteDice) -** [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24845-Boat-Parts-0-90-R4-65](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24845-Boat-Parts-0-90-R4-65)
